itunes:title: Episode 583 - DB Sports Companion Show 04/21/20 - Arizona Diamondbacks Pitcher Archie Bradley
title: Episode 583 - DB Sports Companion Show 04/21/20 - Arizona Diamondbacks Pitcher Archie Bradley
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with special guest Arizona Diamondbacks pitcher Archie Bradley to discuss his knowledge of the Houston Astros cheating, Archie’s love for college football, talk about the redeeming qualities of the sport of Baseba...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with special guest Arizona Diamondbacks pitcher Archie Bradley to discuss his knowledge of the Houston Astros cheating, Archie’s love for college football, talk about the redeeming qualities of the sport of Baseball, go through the best closer walkout songs, and Archie tells all about his days as a rookie hanging out at Arizona State and old town Scottsdale.
